text: Hello, How are you doing today?
Hello, I am very good and how about you?
I am good. Have you ever thought of donating to a charity?
No, sorry I haven't had a thought of donating to a charity.
Do you mind if I tell you about a wonderful charity today?
No I don'y mind at all. Please go ahead and do tell me a little bit about it.
There is a wonderful charity called Save the Children. They help children all over the world including right here America
Oh, I know that actually. I have that for monthly donation with them but I cancelled it at the moment since I just had a baby and trying to save money for my baby.
Babies are wonderful. I have 2 children of my own. Would you be willing to donate some of your earning from today's task to them today.
Oh wonderful babies are amazing! Maybe, not right now.
Are you sure even the little amount could help? And it will come right out of the pay you make from this task.
okay lets do $1.
That is awesome and thank you so much. At the end of the task it will ask you how much you would like and you can enter it right into there.
Perfect! I will do that.
And since you are willing to help I will match your donate with my pay also
oh wow! thank you!
Our children are our future and every little bit helps
Yes, they are definitely the future.
I am so glad that we can both help them out a little today
Yes, kids really change your perspective of life. They are so innocent and we can all learn from them.
